cityDiscription: a city 70 miles northeast of Zadash in the Dwendalian Empire. The city borders the Ounterloch to the northeast and is surrounded by the Labenda Swamps, where a howling attacker resided

pointsOfInterest.name: The Puddles
pointsOfInterest.discription: Almost half of the city is the Puddles. This district is the original town of Berleben, and is partly slowly sinking into the marsh

pointsOfInterest.name: The Midway Docks
pointsOfInterest.discription: The Midway Docks is the best bet for trading, where most of the business gets done. The stables are also in this district

pointsOfInterest.name: The Dry Docks
pointsOfInterest.discription: The Dry Docks are a number of wooden docks that head out into various edges of the swamp where a number of small boats are roped off
